title: Eleftherios Mertakas
text: Eleftherios Mertakas (; born March 16, 1985 in <a href="Paralimni">Paralimni</a>) is a <a href="Cyprus">Cypriot</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a>, who plays for <a href="Ayia%20Napa%20F.C.">Ayia Napa</a> as a <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a>.
